short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free and open source extension that adds new features to Chess.com matches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chesscom Enhancer adds new quality-of-life features to your Chess.com games that can be toggled on and off whenever you want.

Current features:
- *NEW* Make your components completely anonymous.
- Always display your lifetime score against opponents.
- Hide ratings for as long as you want so you can focus more on the chess.
- One-click button to review your games on Lichess.
- Dynamic alert border when you have less than 10 seconds left, showing green or red with varying intensity based on whether you're behind or ahead on time
- ...and more features on the way!


This extension is completely free and open-source. Check it out here:
https://codeberg.org/rumpetrollet_rumpa/chesscom-enhancer-extension
